thumb.description: 下記リンクにて、この動画内のBGMを販売しています！The background music in this video is for sale at the link below!👉https://bgms.booth.pm/items/6854061----This channel is officially certified by Google as a YouTube Artist Channel (OAC), and you can confirm our status by the ♪ mark displayed next to our channel name.----🎧Youtube👉https://youtu.be/hKbnhjpV644🎧Spotify👉https://open.spotify.com/intl-ja/artist/6VLPxVwd1q9orMwrazrYll 🎧Apple Music👉https://music.apple.com/jp/artist/1804546728 🎧Amazon Music👉https://music.amazon.co.jp/artists/B0F2HZSZT6/honorable-japanese-song ----#kawaii #animelo-fi #anime #lo-fi #animeopening #animeopeningsong #j-pop #pop #japanese music #animemusic #lo-fibeats #chillbeats #chillmusic #relaxingmusic #studymusic #background music #japaneselo-fi #animechill #animevibes #animesoundtrack #jpoplo-fi #animeinstrumental #animeplaylist #lo-fianimemix #animeopeningtheme #japanesepopmusic #animeaesthetic #animemusicmix #chillhop #studybeats #relaxingbeats
